description: Handcrafted organic soft serve, dipped in dark chocolate and served with an optional sprinkle of sea salt.  With decadent sauces, syrups, candies, and baked goods, plus all natural fresh fruit popsicles, and a variety of ice cream sodas and floats.Please refer to our website for schedule in Golden Gate Park: www.twirlanddip.com/locations/  	 ~ Served from our cute colorful ice cream truck ~	  At Twirl and Dip Soft Serve we make our ice cream from the finest, freshest local ingredients. We use Straus Family Creamery milk and cream, organic fair trade chocolate from Tcho and Mama Ganache, and seasonal fresh fruits and herbs from the many organic farmers in Northern California. Our baked goods and toppings are made by us, and we hand roll our own sugar cones. We also create refreshing ice lollies made from whole fruit.We are passionate about the ice cream delights we serve, and we are dedicated to bringing you the dessert you love.
name: Twirl and Dip
